segments.text: I'd like to make a reservation to Rome .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When are you planning to go ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm supposed to be in Rome on the morning of the fourteenth , but I'd rather get there on the evening of the thirteenth .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What time would you like to leave ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Late in the afternoon , after work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have a flight at four thirty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's too early . I don't get out of work until five . Do you have a later flight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The next flight is at five fifteen and there's another at six thirty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd better take the six thirty . It takes quite a while to get to the airport .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we have a seat available on that flight on the thirteenth .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , good . What time does the flight get to Rome ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The flight only takes an hour and a half . It arrives at eight o'clock .
segments.speaker: S2
